name: Rema Harajily
comment: This book is clear and straight to the point. It is a great read and I highly recommend it. It is also an easy and enjoyable read!

name: M.D.
comment: Amazing book! Easy to read and implement. I definitely recommend it to whomever want to learn how to be a "Productive Muslim".

name: Biryani Soul
comment: Love how the book breaks down source of productivity and how to overcome it spiritually, mentally, physical health etc. highly recommend; it compliments their podcasts.

name: Mutia
comment: Great books. Bunch of roses for your team. Sleep tight with understanding barakah concept and sleep cycle.

name: Naved I.
comment: This book really surprised me with how good it was! It was filled with wisdom, lessons that apply to everyone at every stage of life. I highly recommend it!

name: Zaid Rifai
comment: I really liked reading this book. Talks about how a muslim can start his day being productive for the sake of Allah. One piece of advice that I took to habit is staying up after fajir.
